text: O vi messenger ne saddened those hasten disbelieve among those dir Ni kred their busx while their kor ne kred! Among Jud kelk auxskult al mensog! Ili auxskult al popol neniam met vi who distorted vort context tiam dir vi don this akcept gxi vi don anything different beware Whomever DI vol divert vi do nothing help him DI! DI NE wish cleanse their KOR. Ili incurred humiliation en this mond en Hereafter ili sufer terrible retribution
